conversion_verification.notes: True isometric cutaway transformation successfully executed with high fidelity to architectural details.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent treatment of wall thickness, volume, and clean cutaway geometry. Perspective is stable and orthographic-accurate.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity; stair placement, utility room dividers, and the kitchen pantry footprint are accurately captured. Window seat geometry on the right-hand wall is correctly rendered.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen cabinetry and laundry appliances in the utility room match the plan. Major openings and transitions are respected.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with clear material separation. Minor deductions for lacks of high-contrast window glazing, but structural clarity is superior.

detected_errors.description: Some window openings are rendered as simple wall voids without detailed frame geometry.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that accurately translates complex architectural partitions, utility spaces, and structural variations from the 2D plan.
